content.rendered:
Mannheimer Swartling is pleased to announce the election of Oscar Björkman Possne and Therese Strömshed as partners, with effect from 1 January 2017.

”We are delighted to announce the election of two new partners from within our ranks,” says Jan Dernestam, Managing Partner at Mannheimer Swartling.

”Oscar and Therese, who represents two of our specialist groups, have shown an admirable commitment to both our clients and the firm. They are highly respected individuals and it is a privilege to welcome them to their new roles at Mannheimer Swartling. On behalf of everyone at Mannheimer Swartling, I would like to congratulate our new partners. We look forward to their continued success.”

The newly elected partners

Oscar Björkman Possne
Oscar Björkman Possne is a member of Mannheimer Swartling’s Intellectual Property, Marketing and Media practice group and is based in the firm’s office in Stockholm. His practice includes advising clients in intellectual property and marketing law disputes. Oscar also works with intellectual property related matters in transactions, licensing and marketing co-operations. Oscar joined the firm in 2008 and is a member of the Swedish Bar Association.

Therese Strömshed
Therese Strömshed is a member of the Environment practice group and is based in the firm’s office in Malmö. She advises clients in a wide range of environmental matters. Her practice includes advising clients in environmental permit applications and risk assessments in transactions. Therese also works with product compliance related matters. Therese joined the firm in 2007 and is a member of the Swedish Bar Association.

For more information, please contact:

Jan Dernestam, Managing Partner
+46 70 977 73 48, jan.dernestam@msa.se

Helena Sjöholm, Head of Marketing and Communications
+46 70 977 79 34, helena.sjoholm@msa.se
